name: Affordable Pastries
description: This underrated bakery in a hawker centre has cafe-quality croissants, cakes, brownies and tarts from just $3.80
location: 7 Maxwell Road, #02-128 Amoy Street Food Centre, Singapore 069111
details: 10.30am–3pm (Mon to Fri), Closed on Sat, Sun and Public Holidays

name: Mala Buffet
description: This restaurant in the CBD is serving free flow all-you-can-eat mala xiang guo at just S$10 nett for a limited time only
details: 11am–9pm (Mon to Fri), Closed on Sat & Sun

name: Mookata Buffet
description: ABC886 Mookata is open till late with an all-you-can-eat buffet alongside free-flow basil pork rice for just S$19.90
location: 28 Tai Seng Street, Sakae building Level 1 Sinfoodie food court, Singapore 534106
details: 11am–11pm (Tue to Fri), 5pm–11pm (Sat & Sun), Closed on Mon

name: Beer Atm
description: Little Island Brewing Co @ Changi Village has a “Beer ATM” with DIY beer dispensers and beers on tap from just S$1.90
details: 3pm–10pm (Tue to Thur), 12pm–12am (Fri to Sat), 12pm–10pm (Sun), Closed on Mon

name: Prata Buffet
description: The popular Springleaf Prata Place is having a S$9.90 prata buffet with over 25 varieties of sweet & savoury prata from now till 30 June 2024
